title: R.Vivimos Women's Fall Cotton Long Sleeves Casual Ruffle Babydoll Tunic Blouse Tops for Women
features: Material: Cotton/Rayon. Lightweight Soft and Breathable Fabric.
The Simple Solid Colors Tunic Blouse Features Round Neck With Long Lantern Sleeves For a Stylish Look.
The Bottom Has A Tiered Detail and Swing Design. You Can Pair it With Jeans, Shorts or Skirt.
Suitable for Daily Wear, Casual, Office, School, Street, Out for Fun and Vacation etc.
Hand Wash Cold Recommended and Do not tumble dry
